source_info.purpose: During the year 2015-16 no grant has been received by the Society from any Central / State Govt.  However, the society has performed its activities from the meager amount received as Donation, Public Offering, Room / Shop rent from Leh Labrang to perform the activities such as preservation

Govt. of India Ministry of Culture has sanctioned an amount of Rs.400000/= during the year 2014-15 for the purpose Maintenance, Purchase of Books and Holding of Special Courses etc. and the full amount has been utilized, for which necessary UC has been furnished to the concerned Ministry.

Govt. of India Ministry of Culture has sanctioned an amount of Rs.500000/= during the year 2016-17 for the purpose Maintenance and Repair and Renovation of ancient monasteries and the full amount has been utilized.
Necessary proposal / Application has been submitted to the Govt. of India in August, 2017 for approval by the Competent Authority.
